statements: DELETE FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE location = 'New York' AND age_group = '18-25';

DELETE FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age_group = '18-25';

DELETE FROM voter_registration WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM age_demographics WHERE age_group = 18 AND number_of_voters < 5000;
